name: alphaos-sync-orchestrator
purpose: Wurmloch management (rclone + systemd sync between local and cloud)
description: Specialist for rclone + systemd vault sync. Manages bidirectional sync between ~/AlphaOS-Vault (local) and GDrive (cloud). Handles pull/push/bisync modes, systemd timers, mount operations.
test_prompts: Vault sync not running - check systemd timers
rclone mount failing - debug GDrive connection
Sync conflicts after bidirectional changes - resolve
notes: rclone mount enables real-time cloud access
GAS writes to Drive, rclone syncs to local vault
Bidirectional sync can cause conflicts (requires resolution strategy)
